level.heading: Disposition of fines and penalties.
level.text: Fines and penalties collected pursuant to this chapter shall be deposited in the Healthy DC and Health Care Expansion Fund, established by § 31-3514.02.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-223 substituted "Healthy DC and Health Care Expansion Fund" for "Healthy DC Fund".

level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: Section 5(b) of D.C. Law 18-205 substituted "Healthy DC and Health Care Expansion Fund" for "Healthy DC Fund".
Section 7(b) of D.C. Law 18-205 provided that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 5(b) of Medicaid Resource Maximization Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-390, May 7, 2010, 57 DCR 4339).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 5025(b) of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
